AI Description: iRODS iCommands is a collection of command-line utilities for interacting with the iRODS (Integrated Rule-Oriented Data System) data grid management software. These tools facilitate data management, data movement, and metadata operations within an iRODS environment.
Core Features: Data Management Operations, Data Movement & Transfer, Metadata Operations, Scripting & Automation Support, Integration With Irods Data Grid
General Tags: Data Management, Data Movement, Metadata Operations, Command-Line Utilities, Irods Integration
